channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VA

item.title: Report X-2023120041
item.description:
Report X-2023120041

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-14T21:11:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-20
  • City: HAMPTON
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found on a delivery truck with damage. There was no determination how the damage occurred. DescribePack: Package has a dent in the side of the box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed under hood in hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2023110818
item.description:
Report X-2023110818

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-12T22:12:12+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-07
  • City: NORFOLK
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: IN THE UNLOAD, THE DAMAGED HAZMAT INSIDE THE UNLOADING TRAILER WAS FOUND BY A PACKAGE HANDLER. THE PACKAGE WAS LEAKING ON THE BACK SIDE OF THE BOX DescribePack: DURING THE INSPECTION, ONE OF THE BOTTLES CAPS WERE LOOSE CAUSING THE SPILL TO RIP THE BOX OPEN. DurationRel: 2 and MitigateEffect: THE DAMAGE HAZMAT WAS PLACED IN A SAFTEY CONTAINER TO PREVENT OTHER PACKAGES FROM GETTING WET

  • City: WINCHESTER

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was improperly marked and sent up the conveyor belt, when being loaded into trailer. DescribePack: box is packaged with peanuts and foam only on bottom DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: QA was contacted and package put in hazmat bin, only box was wet.

item.title: Report I-2023110051
item.description:
Report I-2023110051

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-08T18:13:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-18
  • City: DULLES
  • State: VA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED AIRLINES HOLDINGS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Customer 8D had and external light inside the carry-on for a camara equipment that turned on by accident The light was inside the carry-on surrounded by toilet paper that caught on fire from the heat of the light bulb TSA was at the gate and they assisted with removing the item from the bag and disposing it Captain requested to have the fire department inspect the item, and CS inspected the customers bags to make sure no other items were hazard Captain was satisfied with the inspections and customer was allowed to travel NRSA/UA employee He flew to IAD on 2136/18OCT BOS IAD and returned on 352/18OCT IAD BOS 52 Crispus Attucks Place ***[12/7/23 - PII REDACTED BY GEM]***
